ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: Computer Specs for Bards CPU: P3 800EB RAM: 256MB Video Card (and RAM): GeForce DDR (32 MB) Video Resolution: 640x480 (don t like mode-switching at higher
ygData.messageBody:
Computer Specs for Bards

CPU: P3 800EB
RAM: 256MB
Video Card (and RAM): GeForce DDR (32 MB)
Video Resolution: 640x480 (don't like mode-switching at higher reses)
Sound Card: Soundblaster Live!
HD speed (rpm): 7200
'Net speed: 56K
Geographic Location: Dayton, OH
Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: Yes, Double
Particle Effects: Yes, High
Mip Mapping: n/a - only works on 3dfx cards.
Clip plane distance: Farthest

How many songs can you twist? If I stare at the ground - sometimes 5, but
that's a major workout ;) Usually it's only necessary to twist 3 at most.
Do you slow down when it rains? No
How about in Unrest or Kunark? All things being equal, no. Unfortunately,
lag is bad in Kunark so I can twist 3, but I find it easier to twist 4 in
pre-Kunark zones. (if that makes any sense?)
